name: Shrimp and Summer Fruit Kabobs
author: Anonymous
summary: Celebrate summer with these sweet and savory shrimp kabobs. Ripe California peaches, nectarines and plums are threaded onto skewers with shrimp, brushed with a garlic and herb oil, and grilled to perfection. Serve alone as an appetizer, or with a green salad and grilled baguette for an easy and lively dinner.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs (such as basil, marjoram, rosemary and thyme)
1 pound large peeled and deveined shrimp
1 pinch Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
directions: Heat oil in a small skillet until very hot
Add garlic and cook briefly until aromatic; do not allow the garlic to brown
Remove from heat immediately and stir in herbs; set aside
Cut peach, plum and nectarine into 1-inch chunks and thread onto skewers alternately with shrimp and lemon slices
Grill over medium-high heat for 3 to 5 minutes per side or until shrimp is pink and cooked through
Remove from grill and drizzle with remaining oil
